titleStmt.title: Cupids reuenge As it hath beene diuers times acted by the Children of her Maiesties Reuels. By Iohn Fletcher
titleStmt.author: Beaumont, Francis, 1584-1616.
Fletcher, John, 1579-1625. aut
Sidney, Philip, Sir, 1554-1586. Arcadia.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Thomas Creede for Iosias Harison, and are to bee solde at the Golden Anker in Pater-Noster-Row,

notesStmt.note: In fact written in collaboration with Francis Beaumont.
Reproduction of the original inthe Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
